short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's easy to add new hires into your payroll/hris system directly from this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's easy to add new hires into your Payroll/HRIS system directly from this extension.
This app makes it easy to add new hires into your Payroll or HRIS system by injecting the job seekers information directly from ApplicantPool without you needing to manually type it in
